attributes.action: help create legislation to ensure that hardware and software purchased in the UK is not heavily marked up in order to subsidise more competitive pricing in foreign markets.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Currently hardware and software, particularly business use software is heavily over-priced in the UK to subsidise foreign markets.

To take a single example, one large company is currently selling its flagship product to UK residents for 165% of the cost to US residents. The price is for an identical download.

We the undersigned accept that some markup is necessary to protect companies from exchange rate fluctuations. We also accept that some price difference is inevitable due to varying tax rates. We do not accept that it is right or fair for UK businesses and individuals to be forced to subsidise their competitors abroad.

We would like the Government to seriously consider legislation that would help level the playing field and enable UK businesses compete internationally without prejudice.
